findings.vulnerability_type_claimed: ERC20 accounting mismatch / unchecked token transfer results (fee-on-transfer & non-standard ERC20 drain)
findings.reasoning: The finding is about the wrong functions (restrictAccess() and grantAccess()) and the wrong root cause. The actual vulnerability is in collectionRestrictaccessBeneficiary().

notes: The finding is about the wrong functions and the wrong root cause. The actual vulnerability is in collectionRestrictaccessBeneficiary().
